name: MongoDB
para: MongoDB is a NoSQL, document-oriented database designed for scalability, performance, and ease of development. Instead of storing data in rows and tables (like in relational databases), MongoDB stores data in JSON-like documents.

name: Mongoose
para: Mongoose is an Object Data Modeling (ODM) library for MongoDB and Node.js. It provides a structured and easy way to interact with MongoDB databases using JavaScript by defining schemas and models.
